# ðŸŽ¯ HÆ¯á»šNG DáºªN Dá»° ÃN ENGKID

## ðŸ“‹ THÃ”NG TIN Tá»”NG QUAN Dá»° ÃN
- **TÃªn dá»± Ã¡n**: EngKid - á»¨ng dá»¥ng há»c tiáº¿ng Anh cho tráº» em
- **Platform**: Flutter (SDK >=2.19.6 <3.0.0)
- **Version hiá»‡n táº¡i**: 0.3.0+34
- **Kiáº¿n trÃºc**: Clean Architecture + GetX State Management
- **Dependency Injection**: GetIt + Injectable

## ðŸ—ï¸ Cáº¤U TRÃšC Dá»° ÃN
```
lib/
â”œâ”€â”€ data/           # Data Layer - Repository implementations, API calls
â”œâ”€â”€ domain/         # Domain Layer - Entities, Use cases, Repository interfaces  
â”œâ”€â”€ presentation/   # Presentation Layer - UI, Controllers, Bindings
â”œâ”€â”€ di/            # Dependency Injection setup
â”œâ”€â”€ utils/         # Utilities, helpers, constants
â”œâ”€â”€ widgets/       # Shared/Common widgets
â”œâ”€â”€ main.dart      # Production entry point
â””â”€â”€ main_common.dart # Common setup cho cáº£ dev vÃ  prod
```

## ðŸŽ® CÃC MODULE CHÃNH
1. **Authentication**: Login, Register, Forgot Password
2. **Home**: Dashboard chÃ­nh cá»§a á»©ng dá»¥ng
3. **Games**: Wordle, Puzzle, Memory, Missing Word
4. **E-Library**: ThÆ° viá»‡n sÃ¡ch Ä‘iá»‡n tá»­, video
5. **Reading Space**: KhÃ´ng gian Ä‘á»c
6. **Management Space**: Quáº£n lÃ½ profile, bÃ¡o cÃ¡o, setting
7. **Notification System**: Há»‡ thá»‘ng thÃ´ng bÃ¡o
8. **Feedback**: Há»‡ thá»‘ng pháº£n há»“i
9. **Leader Board**: Báº£ng xáº¿p háº¡ng

## ðŸ”§ ENVIRONMENTS & BUILD COMMANDS
```bash
# Development
flutter run --flavor dev -t ./lib/main_dev.dart
flutter build apk --flavor dev -t lib/main_dev.dart --release

# Production  
flutter run --flavor prod -t ./lib/main_prod.dart
flutter build apk --flavor prod -t lib/main_prod.dart --release

# Code Generation
flutter pub run build_runner build --delete-conflicting-outputs
flutter pub run build_runner watch --delete-conflicting-outputs
```

## ðŸ“¦ CÃC THÆ¯VIá»†N QUAN TRá»ŒNG
- **State Management**: GetX (get: ^4.6.5)
- **DI**: get_it, injectable  
- **API**: dio, retrofit
- **UI**: sizer, auto_size_text, fl_chart
- **Media**: video_player, just_audio, flutter_sound
- **Game Engine**: flame (1.7.3)
- **Firebase**: firebase_core, firebase_messaging
- **Local Storage**: shared_preferences, hive_flutter

## ðŸŽ¯ QUY ÃšC NAMING & STRUCTURE
1. **File naming**: snake_case (vd: home_screen_ui.dart)
2. **Class naming**: PascalCase (vd: HomeScreenController)
3. **Variable naming**: camelCase (vd: userName)
4. **Binding pattern**: Má»—i screen cÃ³ file _binding.dart vÃ  _ui.dart
5. **Controller pattern**: Extends GetxController cho state management

## ðŸ”„ PATTERNS & ARCHITECTURE
1. **Clean Architecture**: 3 layers (Data - Domain - Presentation)
2. **Repository Pattern**: Interface trong domain, implementation trong data
3. **Use Case Pattern**: Business logic Ä‘Æ°á»£c encapsulate trong use cases
4. **GetX Pattern**: Controller + Binding cho má»—i screen
5. **Dependency Injection**: Sá»­ dá»¥ng GetIt vá»›i Injectable annotation

## ðŸŽ¨ UI/UX COMPONENTS
- **Assets Structure**: 
  - images/, icons/, backgrounds/ - HÃ¬nh áº£nh tÄ©nh
  - audios/, voices/ - File Ã¢m thanh
  - videos/ - Video content
  - gifs/ - Animated content
- **Responsive**: Sá»­ dá»¥ng Sizer package
- **Theming**: Material Design vá»›i custom theme

## ðŸ” SECURITY & CONFIG
- **Environment Variables**: Sá»­ dá»¥ng flutter_dotenv
- **API Configuration**: KhÃ¡c nhau cho dev/prod environments
- **Certificate Pinning**: Custom SSL certificate setup

## ðŸ“± PLATFORM SUPPORT
- **Android**: Primary target vá»›i flavor configuration
- **iOS**: CÃ³ support vá»›i Podfile setup
- **Web**: CÃ³ há»— trá»£ vá»›i HTML renderer
- **Desktop**: Linux, macOS, Windows (cÃ³ CMakeLists.txt)

## ðŸŽ¯ HÆ¯á»šNG DáºªN KHI Xá»¬ LÃ Váº¤N Äá»€

### âœ… KHI Cáº¦N THÃŠM FEATURE Má»šI:
1. Táº¡o entity trong `domain/` layer trÆ°á»›c
2. Implement repository interface trong `domain/`

4. Implement repository trong `data/` layer
5. Táº¡o controller trong `presentation/`
6. Táº¡o binding vÃ  UI
7. Register dependencies trong `di/`

### âœ… KHI DEBUG Lá»–I:
1. Kiá»ƒm tra console logs trÆ°á»›c
2. Verify dependency injection setup
3. Check API endpoints vÃ  network connectivity
4. Validate state management flow
5. Test trÃªn multiple flavors (dev/prod)

### âœ… KHI OPTIMIZE PERFORMANCE:
1. Kiá»ƒm tra memory leaks trong controllers
2. Optimize image/asset loading
3. Review GetX reactive patterns
4. Check for unnecessary rebuilds
5. Profile using Flutter Inspector

### âœ… KHI THÃŠM GAME Má»šI:
1. Extend tá»« Flame game engine
2. Táº¡o trong `presentation/game/` folder
3. Follow pattern cá»§a cÃ¡c game hiá»‡n cÃ³

### âœ… KHI HANDLE AUDIO/VIDEO:
1. Sá»­ dá»¥ng just_audio cho audio playback
2. video_player cho video content

## ðŸš¨ LÆ¯U Ã QUAN TRá»ŒNG
- **LUÃ”N** dispose controllers vÃ  players Ä‘Ãºng cÃ¡ch
- **LUÃ”N** handle exceptions vÃ  network errors
- **LUÃ”N** follow Clean Architecture principles
- **LUÃ”N** validate permissions trÆ°á»›c khi access device features

## ðŸ” DEBUGGING HELPERS
